title: Most Consumers Use Electricity For Luxury...Why Won't There Be Huge Utility Tariffs? - Anim Piesie
text: NDC Communicator Anim Piesie has blamed Ghanaians partially for the continual energy crises facing the nation. Contributing to a panel discussion on PeaceFM's "Kokrokoo", Anim Piesie held strongly that the luxurious lifestyles of some
